complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Next.js project setup into initialization, TypeScript configuration, folder structure creation, and Git setup steps.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a relatively straightforward task for experienced developers, but requires attention to detail in configuration.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into Tailwind CSS installation, configuration, shadcn/ui setup, theme integration, and component testing steps.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While not highly complex, this task involves multiple steps and careful integration of different styling systems.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the layout implementation into creating the Layout component, sidebar structure, main content area, responsive design, and mobile menu toggle functionality.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task requires careful consideration of responsive design and layout structure, increasing its complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into designing the SVG path, implementing the curved shape, applying background styles, ensuring responsiveness, and optimizing performance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating a custom-shaped sidebar with SVG involves complex design work and careful implementation to ensure responsiveness and performance.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the navigation implementation into creating the main menu structure, sub-menu functionality, styling active links, implementing icons, and ensuring accessibility.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves complex state management for active links and sub-menus, as well as careful styling and accessibility considerations.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Set Up Dark and Light Themes
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the theme setup into installing next-themes, configuring theme options, implementing the theme switcher, applying theme-specific styles, and testing theme persistence.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While the concept is straightforward, ensuring consistent theming across all components and persisting user preferences adds complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the glassmorphism implementation into creating the base effect, applying it to modals, creating reusable components, and optimizing performance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Achieving a consistent and performant glassmorphism effect across different components and backgrounds is moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the glow effect implementation into creating SVG filters, applying effects to charts, styling buttons and inputs, creating utility classes, and optimizing performance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing a subtle yet effective glow effect using SVG filters and CSS techniques across various elements is quite complex.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Set Up Recharts for Data Visualization
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Recharts setup into installation, creating a wrapper component, implementing a placeholder chart, and applying the glow effect to chart elements.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Setting up Recharts is relatively straightforward, but creating a custom wrapper and applying effects adds some complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into implementing and styling each core component (Button, Card, Input, etc.), ensuring theme compatibility, adding custom effects, and conducting accessibility testing.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves implementing multiple complex components with custom styling, effects, and accessibility considerations, making it highly complex.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into selecting and implementing the global font, configuring Tailwind typography settings, setting up lucide-react, creating a custom Icon component, and testing across the application.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While not highly complex, this task requires careful configuration and testing to ensure consistency across the application.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into creating a template for placeholder pages, implementing routing, ensuring layout consistency, and adding basic content for each page.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This is a relatively simple task, mainly involving repetitive work in creating basic page structures and routing.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the responsive implementation into defining breakpoints, adjusting layouts, implementing mobile sidebar behavior, testing on various devices, and optimizing performance.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Ensuring consistent responsiveness across the entire application, especially with complex elements like the sidebar, is a challenging task.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the setup into installing ESLint and Prettier, configuring rules, integrating with the IDE, setting up pre-commit hooks, and testing the configuration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: While important, setting up linting and formatting tools is a relatively straightforward task for experienced developers.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into creating project documentation, component documentation, writing test plans, conducting final testing, creating user guides, and compiling a project handover document.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive documentation and thorough final testing are crucial and time-consuming tasks, requiring attention to detail and coverage of all implemented features.
